tools.name: Actors MCP Server
tools.description: Use 3,000+ pre-built cloud tools to extract data from websites, e-commerce, social media, search engines, maps, and more

tools.name: aws
tools.description: AWS integration for managing cloud resources.

tools.name: brave_search
tools.description: Privacy-focused web search using Brave API.

tools.name: everything
tools.description: Search for files and content dynamically.

tools.name: fetch
tools.description: Retrieve raw content from any URL.

tools.name: filesystem
tools.description: Read and write files on the local filesystem.

tools.name: git_read
tools.description: Read and search git repositories.

tools.name: github_pr
tools.description: Interact with GitHub Issues and Pull Requests.

tools.name: gitlab
tools.description: GitLab integration for issues and MRs.

tools.name: google_maps
tools.description: Search places and get directions via Google Maps.

tools.name: memory
tools.description: Persistent knowledge graph memory for the agent.

tools.name: playwright
tools.description: Browser automation using Microsoft Playwright.

tools.name: postgres
tools.description: Access PostgreSQL databases.

tools.name: puppeteer
tools.description: Browser automation and scraping.

tools.name: sentry
tools.description: Query Sentry errors and issues.

tools.name: sequential_thinking
tools.description: A tool for structured, step-by-step thinking and problem solving.

tools.name: slack
tools.description: Interact with Slack workspaces.

tools.name: sqlite_query
tools.description: Execute read-only SQL queries on a local database.

tools.name: time
tools.description: Get current time and timezone info.

tools.name: weather
tools.description: Get current weather using OpenWeatherMap or other providers.
